text: Trading Places is a 1983 American comedy movie. It is a satire directed by John Landis. It is set in Philadelphia and New York City. It stars Dan Aykroyd, Eddie Murphy, Ralph Bellamy, Don Ameche, Denholm Elliott and Jamie Lee Curtis. == Other websites == * Category:1983 comedy movies Category:American comedy movies Category:English-language movies Category:Movies set in New York City Category:Movies set in Philadelphia Category:Trading movies Category:Movies directed by John Landis Category:Paramount Pictures movies
title: Trading Places
